articles.content: Paedophile pop star Gary Glitter will be released from prison early next year, according to a report. The 78-year-old, whose real name is Paul Gadd, was jailed for 16 years for attempted rape, unlawf… [+1815 chars]

articles.title: #XmasNo1 Contenders: Mariah and Wham!'s festive classics - Official Charts Company
articles.description: Having both hit Number 1 this year, All I Want For Christmas Is You and Last Christmas' chances of claiming the Christmas Number 1 for the first time shouldn't be discounted.
articles.content:
Sometimes, you can't discount the classics.

articles.title: Coronation Street's Alan Halsall opens up on kissing co-star for 21 years - Express
articles.description: Coronation Street couple Fiz Stape and Tyrone Dobbs have been in an on-again-off-again relationship for the last 21 years.
